item.title: कुत्ते
item.description: सन २०२४ : सभी कुत्ते कोट पेहेन्ने लगे है।

item.title: Ballpoint
item.description: Very few things compete with the brutalism of the ballpoint pen. Reliable, minimal, cheap. No matter how cool a fountain pen might be, its hard leaving a trusty ballpoint behind.

item.title: High Tea Iit Murderer
item.description: High ☕ : Solving Crime | From IIT grad to wanted criminal in the UK and India: The shocking story of Nagendra Reddy - The Indian Express

item.title: Whimsymaxxing
item.description: Whimsymaxxing, This new trend of people putting their childhood photos in their profile pictures is another form of whimsymaxxing. An attempt to return to their untainted child like creativity.
